product_name: Light My Fire Spork Case with Spork - 2012 Overstock
long_description: Enjoy the blend of whimsical design and utilitarian function in the Spork Case and Spork from Light My Fire. Camping is more fun when even the necessities have a sense of style. Snap closure secures the spork and keeps it organized for easy packing; eyelet at one end makes it easy to hang around your neck or attach to a backpack. Included spork is made with BPA-free Tritan(TM) copolyester. Tough, durable polypropylene case is built to last through years of camping, hiking and backpacking trips. Overstock.
short_description: Enjoy the blend of whimsical design and utilitarian function in the Spork Case and Spork from Light My Fire. Camping is more fun when even the necessities have a sense of style.
